page.title: 11TODAYS HOMES AND PEOPLE
page.content: {MEADOW PARK NEW BUILDING CONTIUED. PEOPLE WHO BUY ONE OF THE NEW HOUSES CAN CHOOSE FROM 6 COLOUR SCHEMES,WILL GET 140MM OF LOFT INSULATION AND COULD HAVE DOUBLE GLAZING AS AN EXTRA. {-------------------------------------- {RESULTS OF SURVEY OF HOUSEHOLDS IN A {CROSS SECTION OF WILLAND.(100 RETURNS) {-------------------------------------- {TYPES OF HOUSE_______AGES OF HOUSES_ TERRACE { 26% }1985_1975{19.5% SEMI_DETACHED {26% }1975_1945{46.0% DETACHED {17% }1945_1900{16.0% BUNGALOW {15% }1N 1800'S{ 8.0% FARMHOUSE { 2% }PRE 1799 {10.0% RENTED { 22% }THE OLDEST HOUSES OWNER OCCUPIED{ 30% }IN THE SURVEY ------------------ WERE TWO FARMS ------------------- GERSTON/HARPITT { 1506 {-------------------------------------- {
